item.title: Introducing SOFAMesh - A Solution for Large Scale Service Mesh based on Istio
item.description: SOFAMesh is an solution for large-scale Service Mesh based on Istio open-sourced by Ant Financial. At the same time it is also as one of components in SOFA(Scalable Open Financial Architecture) which is open sourced by Ant Financial.
